post.author: 권경화
post.content:
Hi
Global Skills is in the process of finding approximately 11 Java J2EE developers to work for our client. These are full time positions and all developers are to be located to Vancouver. The relocation, if needed, would be paid for by our client.
You would be working on multiple development projects at one time.
The Salary range is between $50,000 and 70,000 depending on skill level and experience.
If you are interested, please email an updated resume and a time that would be convenient to speak with you.
If you know of anyone that might want to apply for these positions please feel free to forward this message to them.
Thank you for your time
Daniel
www.globalskills.ca
post.title: Full time J2EE developer position
